title: Zhuzhou City Break near Xiangjiang River with Indoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Relax in urban elegance with a stay at this stylish hotel that's perfectly positioned in the heart of Zhuzhou. With a coveted location overlooking the enchanting Xiangjiang River, this decadent retreat is a stone's throw from the bustling city centre. Sample Huanan flavours at Xiangyue Chinese Restaurant, or grab a refreshing drink or spot of afternoon tea at Xiangyue Lobby Lounge.

With your hotel offering the ideal base for exploration, learn about the city's rich cultural heritage with a visit to the heritage Shennong Park or the impressive Yan Emperor Themed Park of Shennong. At the end of a long day, unwind with a refreshing dip in the indoor pool or work up a sweat at the fitness centre.
offer_address: 888 South Binjiang Road, Tianyuan District, Zhuzhou 412007, China
